title: No way to checking which champion u've got chest already yet?
body: I'm trying to find where can I check if I earned a chest with this champion already or not, but I didn't find any information at collection, is there  somewhere I can find it? or riot need to add this to alpha client :3 ?

replies.body: The feature was added this week, in collections, hopefully it will be made available with the next patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot a huevo,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=0WjT40fv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-20T04:02:33.924+0000)
>
> The feature was added this week, in collections, hopefully it will be made available with the next patch.

okie thank you for the explanation~ <3
